text: Five Nights at Freddy's is an 2023 horror movie directed by Emma Tammi. It's based on the popular video game of the same name, created by Scott Cawthon. The film is produced by Blumhouse Productions and Scott Cawthon Productions. It stars Josh Hutcherson, Elizabeth Lail, Piper Rubio, Mary Stuart Masterson, and Matthew Lillard. The story revolves around a security guard who takes a night job at an old family entertainment centre. He soon realizes that the animatronic mascots come to life and pose a deadly threat to anyone remaining after midnight. A sequel will release on December 5, 2025. == Cast == * Josh Hutcherson as Micheal Afton, a new security guard at Freddy Fazbear's Pizza * Elizabeth Lail as Vanny, a local police officer * Piper Rubio as Abby, Mike's younger sister * Matthew Lillard as William Afton(purple guy), Mike's career counsellor and the main villain of the movie * Mary Stuart Masterson as Aunt Jane, Mike's aunt * Kat Conner Sterling as Max, Abby's babysitter * Lucas Grant as Garrett === Voices === * Kevin Foster as Freddy Fazbear * Jade Kindar-Martin as Bonnie * Jessica Weiss as Chica * Roger Joseph Manning Jr. as Foxy == References == Category:2023 horror movies Category:2023 science fiction movies Category:2023 thriller movies Category:2020s horror thriller movies Category:2020s English-language movies Category:American horror thriller movies Category:American science fiction horror movies Category:Halloween movies Category:Universal Pictures movies Category:Five Nights at Freddy's
title: Five Nights at Freddy's (movie)
